GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, VOIP Support, Pushmail  (Mail for Exchange), Outlook
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Headset, Battery, Handset, Charger, Nokia 4 GB microSD Card, User Guide

Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Integrated Hands-free Speakers, Album Graphics Display in Music Player, Audio Streaming

Camera.Other Camera Features: Fixed Focus, f/2.4 Aperture, Focal Length: 32 mm, Minimum Focus Range: 44 cm, Flash Operating Range: 1.0 m, Flash Modes: Off, Automatic and On, Landscape Orientation, Auto and Manual White Balance, Full Screen Viewfinder, Capture Modes, Scene Modes, Colou, Image Editor

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v3, Supported Profiles (HFP 1.5, A2DP 1.2, OPP 1.1, PBAP 1.0, AVCTP 1.3, HSP 1.1)

Other Features.Important Apps: Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, LINE, WeChat, Yahoo Mail, Gmail, Nokia Mail, Windows Live, Hotmail, Direct Chat, eBuddy IM, Nokia Nearby, Nokia Music, YouTube, Instant Messaging
Other Features.SAR Value: GSM 900 - At the Head - 0.89 W/Kg, At the Body - 0.51 W/Kg; GSM 1800 - At the Head - 1.27 W/Kg

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Brightness Control, Curved Display, Screen Double Tap, Multipoint Touch, Low Power Mode
